ENGLISH: A hundred years of undue burden upon our people ends today.\! May the house of Dargon never be broken again... and may Donar be by your side, my love.
ZH-cn: 百年来人民身上背负着的重担今天结束了。\!愿达贡家族永远完好……也愿多纳尔与你同在，我的挚爱。

ENGLISH: A hundred years of undue burden upon our people ends today.\! May the house of Dargon never be broken again.
ZH-cn: 百年来人民身上背负着的重担今天结束了。\!\!愿达贡家族永远完好。

ENGLISH: Should anyone happen to threaten my little King Jules, well...\| you know.
ZH-cn: 如果有人碰巧威胁到我的小国王朱尔斯，嗯……\|你知道会发生什么。

ENGLISH: I'm so happy for you, Jules!
Well, brother?\! Are you going to be comfortable as King, or must I usurp the throne myself?\! I am the official Princess-Royale, you know!
ZH-cn: 怎么，哥哥？\!你到底是要安心当国王，还是必须由我篡位才行？\!我可是正八经的皇家公主，你知道的！

ENGLISH: I am jesting, dear brother!\! Oh my stars, how dangerously naive!\! I implore you to depend on your followers, for there will be many who will wish you harm...
ZH-cn: 我在开玩笑，亲爱的哥哥！\!我的天，真是天真得可怕啊！\!我恳请你多多依靠你的属下，因为会有很多人想要伤害你的……

ENGLISH: \n[8], we had such a journey together...\| But our struggle has only just begun.\! Don't forget about me...
ZH-cn: \n[8]，我们一起走过了一段难忘的旅程……\|但我们的斗争才刚刚开始。\!不要忘记我……
